name: Dodgerman
detailed_description:
Game plot

Once, when you spent time with your girlfriend …
An incident occurred …
Girl: “Why do you have two toothbrushes?”
Another girl forgot one of these here
You need some kind of redemption. Try to wiggle out of this dangerous situation!
All outcomes of these bloody amorous battles depends on your decisions!

Gameplay

The game is very simple. You just need to choose the answer options!
Girls will to fail you in different situation.
Your goal is to survive in this battle and not to be scuttled by your soul mate!
Answer speed - answer time is limited!
Special endings in some episodes open secret levels.
There are many endings at each stage
Choose different answer choices to complete the level and view all endings.
The number of endings is ... 195!
What will happen if you collect more than 90% ...?
Get to know it!

This game is recommended for:

Lovers of comedy and romantic TV shows, movies, manga and games!
people who have a relationship
This game can be discussed with friends and colleagues.
people who have had similar moments in life.
For those who want just to kill time!

Try to wiggle out of this dangerous situation! All outcomes of these bloody amorous battles depends on your decisions!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 / Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
